${ModID}:TheTransientCutscene.NAME: The Transient Cutscene
BLOCKING_TEXTS: "You should stick around for a little longer next time, my dude."
DESCRIPTIONS: "Yea dude, I had to shrink myself down to get into the cafe" NL NL "So what? I don't care. I love not caring, bro."
"You seem like the type of person that cares too much, bro." NL NL "Sit down with me, I'll show you how to chillax."
"Okay bro, click to start chilling." NL NL "When you are done with chilling, you can click again."
You feel your body become lighter, as if a piece of your burdened self has #bfaded #baway. NL NL You look down at your equipment. Its form seems to #bshift in your hand.
"Sick bro, that was some great work." NL NL "With some more practice, you'll be one of us in no time."
Wait, where did the Transient go?
"Sure dude, you can come back any time to chill." NL NL "...or don't, I don't care."
"Bro, you're done so soon?" NL NL "We were just getting to the good part."
OPTIONS: Transient cards #yExhaust and are permanently removed after being played #b5 times. NL If a Transient card is not a starter card, its base cost is reduced by #b1.
Give a card Transient (Exhaust, removed after 5 plays, costs 1 less if non-starter).
